alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Hendry; Inland Broward County; Inland Collier County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 3:55PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Collier, southeastern Hendry, northern Broward and Palm Beach Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 355 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Indiantown to near Okeelanta to near Miccosukee Indian Reservation. Movement was east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Wellington, Jupiter, Palm Beach Gardens, Belle Glade, Pahokee, Tequesta, South Bay, Canal Point, Royal Palm Beach, Belle Glade Camp, Holey Land Wildlife Refuge, North County Airport, Loxahatchee Groves, Miccosukee Indian Reservation, Lion Country Safari Park, Okeelanta, Rotenberger Wildlife Refuge, Miccosukee Service Plaza and The Acreage. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
